name: John Carter
title: Head Tennis Coach
description: With over 15 years of professional experience, John specializes in developing competitive junior players.

name: Emily White
title: Lead Swim Instructor
description: An Olympic medalist, Emily brings a world-class perspective to our swimming programs for all ages.

name: David Lee
title: Basketball Program Director
description: David played professional basketball for 10 years and now focuses on building strong team dynamics.

name: Maria Garcia
title: Head of Fitness & Training
description: Maria is a certified strength and conditioning specialist dedicated to helping members achieve their peak physical condition.

name: Chris Evans
title: Yoga & Mindfulness Coach
description: Chris combines ancient yoga techniques with modern mindfulness practices to improve flexibility and reduce stress.

name: Sophia Loren
title: Nutritionist
description: Sophia provides personalized nutrition plans to help members optimize their diet for performance and health.
